text: My poslali tebya (o prorok!) ko vsem lyudyam s istinnoy religiyey, dobrovestnikom o raye dlya tekh, kto uveroval, i uveshchevatelem o kare v adskom ogne dlya tekh, kto ne uveroval. Ne bylo prezhde ni odnoy obshchiny, v kotoruyu ne byl by poslan prorok ot Allakha, uveshchevavshiy o nakazanii Allakha
